contentList.content:
Karsus was born a mortal human, gifted with magic but cursed by his excessive arrogance and ambition. Though he only achieved apotheosis for a brief moment, but it was enough to forever change the very fabric of the Weave and bring down the then goddess of magic, Mystryl.

Domains: Arcana, Ambition
Alignment: Chaotic Neutral

Karsus was born a mortal human, gifted with magic but cursed by his excessive arrogance and ambition. Though he only achieved apotheosis for a brief moment, but it was enough to forever change the very fabric of the Weave and bring down the then goddess of magic, Mystryl.

Karsus was born a mortal human, gifted with magic but cursed by his excessive arrogance and ambition. Karsite paladins, though a rare sight, often mirror his ambitious spirit but try to avoid allowing the same arrogance to cloud their judgement.
